CustomField.formula: IF( STIMULAN_Bullet__c = true, "STIMULAN Bullet Mat and Introducer: "&TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)&" "& TEXT(STIMULAN_Bullet_Price__c) &BR(), NULL) & IF(STIMULAN_Kit_5cc__c = true, "STIMULAN Kit 5cc: "& TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)&" "&TEXT(STIMULAN_Kit_5cc_Price__c) &BR(), NULL) & IF(STIMULAN_Kit_10cc__c = true, "STIMULAN Kit 10cc: "&TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) &" "& TEXT(STIMULAN_Kit_10cc_Price__c) &BR(), NULL) & IF(STIMULAN_Rapid_Cure_5cc__c = true, "STIMULAN Rapid Cure 5cc: "&TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)&" " & TEXT( STIMULAN_Rapid_Cure_5cc_Price__c ) &BR(), NULL) & IF(STIMULAN_Rapid_Cure_10cc__c = true, "STIMULAN Rapid Cure 10cc: "&TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode) &" "& TEXT( STIMULAN_Rapid_Cure_10cc_Price__c ) &BR(), NULL) & IF(STIMULAN_Rapid_Cure_20cc__c = true, "STIMULAN Rapid Cure 20cc: "&TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode)&" " & TEXT( STIMULAN_Rapid_Cure_20cc_Price__c ) &BR(), NULL) & IF( Other_Product__c = true, "Other: "& Other_Product_Details__c , NULL)
CustomField.label: Product Selected
